蒢字的基本解释

蒢
chú
〔黄蒢〕一种中药草。

蒢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chú］
［《廣韻》直魚切，平魚，澄。］
(1)草名。即蘵。《尔雅·释草》：“蘵，黄蒢。”一说，即地榆。
(2)见“蘧蒢”。

蒢字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蒢； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1048第34
【唐韻】直魚切【集韻】陳如切，?音除。【爾雅·釋草】蘵，黃蒢。【類篇】葉似酸漿，華小而白，中心黃。江東以爲葅食。　又【博雅】菗蒢，地楡也。　又蘧蒢。詳蘧字註。

【唐韻】直魚切【集韻】陳如切，?音除。【爾雅·釋草】蘵，黃蒢。【類篇】葉似酸漿，華小而白，中心黃。江東以爲葅食。　又【博雅】菗蒢，地楡也。　又蘧蒢。詳蘧字註。
蒢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蒢字的起名意思

暂无。

chú
〔黄豢〕A kind of Chinese herbal medicine.
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chú]
["Guangyun" cut straight fish, flat fish, clear. ]
(1) Cursive name. That is to say. "Erya Shicao": "Beng, Huang Feng." One said, that is, Sanyu.
(2) See "蘧蒢".
Slap
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蒢; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1048 Page 34
【Tang Yun】Straight fish cut 【Ji Yun】Chen Ruqie, and the sound is divided. 【Erya·Shucao】蘵, Huang Feng. 【Classification】The leaves resemble physalis, the Chinese are small and white, and the center is yellow. Jiangdong thought it would be a food.　【Bo Ya】菗蒢，地楡也。　蘧蒢 again. Detailed note of the word. 【Tang Yun】Straight fish cut 【Ji Yun】Chen Ruqie, and the sound is divided. 【Erya·Shucao】蘵, Huang Feng. 【Classification】The leaves resemble physalis, the Chinese are small and white, and the center is yellow. Jiangdong thought it would be a food.　【Bo Ya】菗蒢，地楡也。　蘧蒢 again. Detailed note of the word.
